item.content:
Robo Wars(Mini)

Robowars Mini is a real-time arcade game in which two opponents would be competing with their manually operated robots with the objective of immobilizing each other. The last robot standing would be the winner.

ROBOTS PER EVENT :Two
LENGTH OF EVENT :5 Mins
ROBOT WEIGHT RANGE :4 KG
ROBOT DIMENTIONS : As Per Rules
ARENA SPECIFICATIONS :As Per Center
ROBOT CONTROLS : Autonomous or Remote control
ENGINEERING PRINCIPLES :Art, mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, computer science, etc
